attributes.action: Create an 'Enduring Index of Taxation' that shows the true extent of all taxation in Britain, for this and subequent governments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An Index is needed that determines the true level of taxation in Great Britain, then returns a simple value, much as The Retail Price Index, The Inflation figure, & The Base Rate. All aspects should be included in such a way as to reveal the true extent of 'stealth taxes', making the taxation system more transparent. Thus enabling citizens to determine whether a Government is truly returning 'Value for Money'.
